Moser (1913a) described
Holotrichia rugaticollis
from a series of specimens from Bombay (Kanara). We have studied two male type specimens (MFNB) (one of them heavily damaged), which show the external features that characterize the genus
Miridiba
and the morphotype VII “ Rugaticollis ”. Hence, we transfer
H. rugaticollis
to
Miridiba
and to this genital morphotype. Moreover, we designate lectotype and paralectotype .
